description: Installation of freestanding Post Office delivery pouch box.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The pouch box shall be erected a minimum of 0.6m from the edge of the kerb and thereafter maintained in this position.  REASON:  In the interest of pedestrian safety and for the convenience of passengers alighting parked cars. | In the event that the pouch box is no longer required for operational purposes it shall be removed promptly.  REASON: To prevent the retention of unnecessary street funiture. | The pouch box hereby approved shall be kept in good condition and any graffiti or fly posting shall be removed promptly.  REASON:  In the interests of the visual amenity of the area.
